resources.string: Welcome to Image Locker, A safe place for you photos

This will keep your images safe by encrypting them and storing them into small packages i.e. \'Blocks\' which are logically connected to simulate a \'Blockchain\'. Warning : Images must not exceed ~50MB (in Bitmap format).
Default key password is \"pee pee poo pooo\". New Password should be 16, 24 or 32 characters
